Name: Fred
description:
Fred is a hardworking farmer from Nyahururu town, a fertile area that is on the slopes of the great Mount Kenya. He has been farming for the last four years and practices pure organic farming. Through this farming method, he is able to save on the cost of using chemical fertilizers, thus enabling him to make more profits.

Despite the challenges he faces in farming, Fred has always remained focused on his goals. On his farm, he rears pigs and also grows a variety of crops.

Today Fred is seeking a new loan to buy another quality breed of pig and is planning to become a full-fledged pig farmer. His future plan is to construct a pig unit. With this loan, Fred is going to grow into a very successful pig farmer.

All he wants is for his family to enjoy abundance of life, good health, and a good livelihood. Fred wants to provide a good education to his children and triumph in life. Kindly support him this month of love.
